General.Name: Hefei Fengle Seed Co Ltd
General.Description: Hefei Fengle Seed Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and sale of seeds, agrochemicals, and spices in China. The company offers hybrid rice, hybrid corn, conventional water rice, silage corn, wheat, rape, watermelon and melon, and vegetable seeds. It also provides pesticides and fertilizers, as well as natural mint series and synthetic cooling agents. In addition, the company offers herbicides, fungicides, insecticides, seed coating agents, and other products; fragrance products; and technical products include quizalofop-p-ethyl, nicosulfuron-methyl, tribenuron-methyl, and fenoxaprop-p-ethyl, etc. Its products are used in field crops weeding, pest control, crop growth protection, and crop yield. Hefei Fengle Seed Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is based in Hefei, China.

4.Name: Ms. Xiaoxin  Gu
